dc:description: Ushabti. Limestone, paint. H.: 0.190 m, W. 0.065 m, D. (feet) 0.045 m, D. (head) 0.048 m. Almost intact, with minor chipping and wear at face, hands, feet. Modern intervention of two metal pins set in plaster and protruding from feet. Pinkish limestone with black and red paint. Lappet headdress, painted black. Arms crossed over torso. Seed sack over right shoulder. Vertical band of black-painted hieroglyphs down front. Feet undifferentiated (Rocks, Paper, Memory; Larson).
